troubleshooting.shortdesc: The system has detected a memory problem in memory.

condition.p: The fault indicator flashes on the front panel, and the error log contains the E247 error message.

cause.p: A transient memory fault has occurred.

step.cmd: Monitor the system periodically to see whether the alarm recurs.

cause.p: A recurring memory fault indicates a possible problem with the system memory board. Reseating the board might fix the problem.
Reseating the system memory board did not fix the problem. Replacing the board might fix the problem.
